lines.text: Very sad affair...but it's the best night's business we've had for some time. I can make a very attractive club rate for six.
Well, Silver, you can lock up now. The corpus delicti have been identified and Hawkins here offers a very good club rate -- six coffins, no flowers, no mourners.
Good afternoon, gentlemen. Am I wrong or are my services required?
You get around fast, don't you?
In my profession, it pays to keep one's ear attuned to the bark of a six-gun.
There's one cartridge in this gun and five empty chambers. This slug with your name on it may be the first or the last... or somewhere in between.
Chief, that's one for the book.
I thought you'd like that. I'm going to give you a gambling chance. If you give me an honest answer to my question, you walk out that door a free man.
You expect me to believe that?
That's another gamble you'll have to take. At the moment, the odds are five to one that this is an empty chamber.
Now I wonder what Cabeau saw in those two to worry about?
The town grew fast and loud. And as usual, men died faster... louder.

[to Julie]
It won't be long before we have that big house in Denver like we both wanted, Honey.
